EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Denver Happy Hour Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for a Pivotal Happy Hour - Tuesday, April 28th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
You and a guest are invited to join us for happy hour after the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/denver>. Drinks and hors d'oeuvres will be provided.
Date: Tuesday, April 28th Time: 4:30pm to 7:00pm
Location: Cool River Cafe <http://www.coolrivercafe.com/denver/?locId=cool-river-cafe-denver> 8000 E. Belleview Ave., Suite C10 Denver, CO Map/Driving Directions
Please RSVP directly to Ward Maddux <mailto:wmaddux@pivotal.io> or Paul Santos <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io>. We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team
